1.04.name: wordpress/memory-viewer
1.04.description: Memory Viewer is a WordPress plugin that allows you to view WordPress' memory utilization at several hooks during WordPress' execution. It also shows a summary of MySQL Queries that have ran as well as CPU time. This is version 1 of the Memory Viewer plugin. It is very simple. All you need to do is: 1. Enable the plugin 2. Visit your WordPress site (YOU MUST be logged in as an administrator) 3. Scroll to the bottom of your page to see the data
